pullRequest.title: #2053 implicit device registration jdbc registry
pullRequest.bodyText:
This pull request depends on #2094 being merged first.
So I guess it makes sense to review the second commit only.
Note however that this PR partially shares changes with #2358 and #2360  in order to not depend these being merged before.

beforeCommit.message:
[#2053] Adding capability to auto-provision devices to JDBC-based device registry.

Signed-off-by: Florian Kaltner <florian.kaltner@bosch.io>
